title: Strange Lag that i cant explain.
body:
Hey guys so heres the thing. I have been playing league and getting random spikes of ping up to 300 odd (normally sits at 61) and the whole screen will freeze for a second or two then catch up again. I am playing on the same connecting as someone else and he isn't experiencing ANY lag whatsoever. 

I can't really explain it. I was told its likely the game server but from what i understand i didnt think that game server side lag makes the ping change. regardless has anyone had anything similar? Im concerned that it could be a hardward issue at this point. (all software has been updated)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please do the following for me;

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
